mapper.select: select s.id,s.survey_name,s.survey_state,s.creator,s.notes, st.id as titleId,st.survey_id,st.title,st.title_type,st.required,st.title_sequence,null as text, tos.id as optionId,tos.title_id,tos.option_name,tos.option_sequence from survey s left join survey_titles st on s.id=st.survey_id left join title_options tos on st.id = tos.title_id where s.id = #{surveyId} order by st.title_sequence,tos.option_sequence

select s.id,s.survey_name,s.survey_state,s.creator,s.notes, st.id as titleId,st.survey_id,st.title,st.title_type,st.required,st.title_sequence, tos.id as optionId,tos.title_id,tos.option_name,tos.option_sequence from survey s left join survey_titles st on s.id=st.survey_id left join title_options tos on st.id = tos.title_id where s.id = #{surveyId} order by st.title_sequence,tos.option_sequence

select s.id,s.survey_name,s.survey_state,s.creator,s.notes, st.id as titleId,st.survey_id,st.title,st.title_type,st.required,st.title_sequence, tos.id as optionId,tos.title_id,tos.option_name,tos.option_sequence,ss.id as answerId,ss.title_id as answerTitleId,ss.submit_id as answerSubmitId,ss.option_id as answer from survey s left join survey_titles st on s.id=st.survey_id left join title_options tos on st.id = tos.title_id left join submits_single ss on ss.option_id=tos.id where s.id = #{surveyId} and st.title_type='0' union all select s.id,s.survey_name,s.survey_state,s.creator,s.notes, st.id as titleId,st.survey_id,st.title,st.title_type,st.required,st.title_sequence, tos.id as optionId,tos.title_id,tos.option_name,tos.option_sequence,sm.id as answerId,sm.title_id as answerTitleId,sm.submit_id as answerSubmitId,sm.option_id as answer from survey s left join survey_titles st on s.id=st.survey_id left join title_options tos on st.id = tos.title_id left join submits_multiple sm on sm.option_id=tos.id where s.id = #{surveyId} and st.title_type='1' union all select s.id,s.survey_name,s.survey_state,s.creator,s.notes, st.id as titleId,st.survey_id,st.title,st.title_type,st.required,st.title_sequence, tos.id as optionId,tos.title_id,tos.option_name,tos.option_sequence,subt.id as answerId,subt.title_id as answerTitleId,subt.submit_id as answerSubmitId,subt.text as answer from survey s left join survey_titles st on s.id=st.survey_id left join title_options tos on st.id = tos.title_id left join submits_text subt on subt.title_id=st.id where s.id = #{surveyId} and st.title_type='2';

select ss.id as submitId,ss.survey_id,ss.submitter,st.id,st.submit_id,st.title_id,st.text as answer from survey_submits ss left join submits_text st on st.submit_id = ss.id where ss.survey_id=#{surveyId} union all select ss.id as submitId,ss.survey_id,ss.submitter,ssg.id,ssg.submit_id,ssg.title_id,ssg.option_id as answer from survey_submits ss left join submits_single ssg on ssg.submit_id = ss.id where ss.survey_id=#{surveyId} union all select ss.id as submitId,ss.survey_id,ss.submitter,sm.id,sm.submit_id,sm.title_id,sm.option_id as answer from survey_submits ss left join submits_multiple sm on sm.submit_id = ss.id where ss.survey_id=#{surveyId}
